0: It was renovated no long ago and everything was clean and in good condition
And the general upkeep of the hotel grounds was good
But the hotel manager told me that it should be repaired for one day
I attribute this to the pool undergoing a renovation while we were there
The grounds are very nice and we can see they are constantly upgrading the place as they had just renovated the gym and were already busy with other areas
While this gym was large and had lots of equipment it is in need of renovation
it is a nice hotel with updated bathroom décor and comfortable bed
Yes it is an older hotel but has recently been updated nicely
With the right architect it could be redone into a very nice modern retro resort

Its been renovated very nicely and is a rather massive property that they could develop so much further and I hope they decide what to do with all the land they have over by the left near the water where mini golf used to be
1: Rooms are ok but desperately need updating
The Hilton Curacao was an amazing vacation withe many memories but the resort is rather small and needs some updating in the childrens area
Yes the carpeting in the hallways could be renewed but the rooms are clean bright and of very nice size
The entire property is in need of a gut renovation
They attempted to remodel the guest bathrooms and have done a terrible job
They repaired it and were checking the other lights on the floor
It was nt bad but the hotel needs renovations
Hilton needs to update the hotel and furniture
2: The sight of the building from outside was not in great condition either with much rust cracked and crumbling ceilings and faded paint which looked like it had not been maintained for a number of years and requiring serious repair work
Renovations were going on while we were there mostly to the lobby I think meaning checkin had to be outside in the driveway
But if you visit before all renovations are finished do not complain about construction noise
The entire operation needs to be redone
it is beautifully renovated but their service is definitely subpar compared to other Mariot hotels
The renovated Mariot re opened November 2019 is n’t quite ready for business and should n’t have opened
Rooms are updated but somewhat sparse
While the property has been recently renovated and is beautiful it is not advisable to plan on staying solely at the resort during your visit
I have to say in spite of a lot of the negative reviews I read before I booked this hotel for a vacation I thought the resort was pretty good coming off a renovation
I would give this place a 5 if not for a few things that still need to be completed from the renovation
